[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] text engine that provides services for formatting text and breaking text lines. 可以處理不同的文字字元格式和段落樣式，且包含國際文字版面配置的支援。 can handle different text character formats and paragraph styles, and includes support for international text layout. 不同於傳統的文字[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]，則互動文字配置用戶端透過一組回呼方法。Unlike a traditional text [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)], the interacts with a text layout client through a set of callback methods. 它需要用戶端提供這些方法的實作中類別。It requires the client to
